messages.content: I want Cambridge to be a place where everyone succeeds. We all recognise the perfect postcard images of the city and, as a King's graduate, I'm as fond of them as anyone.

But there are many different experiences of living in Cambridge and very often I speak to people who can't enjoy what they love about the city because they are stressed and worried about where Theresa May’s hard Brexit will make this worse.
I fought against the hated bedroom tax.
Five years ago he was voting alongside the Tories and Lib Dems to bomb the innocent citizens of Iraq.
Trump is reckless - I never believed it.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Daniel aims to defend the local turmoil inflicted by cuts and fight for better healthcare services.
Daniel will fight to protect Cambridge’s European research funding and oppose a hard Brexit.
Daniel opposes aligning the UK with Trump's aggressive defense policies.

issues.defence: Lib Dems to bomb the innocent citizens of Iraq. Trump's aggressive defense policies.

leaflet.personalStatement: I want Cambridge to be a place where everyone succeeds. We all recognise the perfect postcard images of the city and, as a King's graduate, I'm as fond of them as anyone. But there are many different experiences of living in Cambridge and very often I speak to people who can't enjoy what they love about the city because they are stressed and worried about where Theresa May’s hard Brexit will make this worse. I’m a passionate European. As your MP, at every opportunity in the Commons I’ve voted to remain in the European Union. I’m independent. I defied my party and voted for a more democratic leadership election. I’m experienced. I secured the legislation to take back control of our trains. I stick to my principles and always put Cambridge First. I’m different from him. I’ll never prop up a Tory government.

endorsements.endorsement: I first met Daniel campaigning for 'Remain'. He's great. An environmentalist and electoral reformer. I'm horrified by the Lib Dem leader’s views on LGBT+ rights. I’m voting Labour.

Daniel is just the kind of politician Cambridge needs. He's intelligent, thoughtful, listens and builds alliances. I'm backing him to get on with the job of representing our great city in challenging times.
Our doctors and nurses are top notch but they’ve been let down by cuts. Meanwhile, social care is in a mess. I know from experience it takes a Labour Government to save the NHS.
